name: Electivire LV.X
author: Shizurow

poke_body.name: Shocking Tail
poke_body.effect: As long as Electivire is your Active Pokémon, whenever your opponent attaches an Energy card from his or her hand to 1 of his or her Pokémon, put 2 damage counters on that Pokémon.

attacks.name: Pulse Barrier
attacks.effect: Discard all of your opponent’s Pokémon Tool cards and Stadium cards in play. If you do, prevent all effects, including damage, done to Electivire during your opponent’s next turn.

rule_box: Put this card onto your Active Electivire. Electivire LV.X can use any attack, Poké-Power, or Poké-Body from its previous level.
